abstract: The hedge fund Elliott Management is raising its bet on Juniper Networks after the networking equipment company announced a series of new initiatives.

lead_paragraph: The hedge fund Elliott Management is raising its bet on Juniper Networks after the networking equipment company announced a series of new initiatives.

headline.main: Elliott Raises Stake in Juniper Networks
